item.title: Tsumi Blue Coral and Howlite Neclace TS182
item.dc:creator: onewithclouds
item.description:
This absolutely fantastic necklace made of howlite, glass, hematite and blue coral is inspired by tribal customs and traditions, as well as ritual dances. An adjustable necklace clasp allows to vary the length of this item within 52cm (20.47"). This luxurious necklace is made with a number of small triangular coral beads, with authentic traces of cutting and an absolutely unique natural blue hue.  Smooth facets of the coral beads are pleasant to the touch, while their arrangement provides the necklace with a sense of genuine volume that is rare of this type of jewelry. This kind of blue coral is mined only on the shoals of the Gulf of Biafra, located on African West Coast near Cameroon. Overall, blue triangular corals are complemented with elliptical howlite beads giving this necklace a feeling of unique and authentic charm, as well as a true sense of presence.

Materials: Howlite, Blue Corals, Glass, Metal Elements, Sterling Silver Logo Charm. Length adjustable up to 52 cm (20.47").

The post Tsumi Blue Coral and Howlite Neclace TS182 appeared first on Nuage Showroom.
item.content:encoded:
This absolutely fantastic necklace made of howlite, glass, hematite and blue coral is inspired by tribal customs and traditions, as well as ritual dances. An adjustable necklace clasp allows to vary the length of this item within 52cm (20.47″). This luxurious necklace is made with a number of small triangular coral beads, with authentic traces of cutting and an absolutely unique natural blue hue.  Smooth facets of the coral beads are pleasant to the touch, while their arrangement provides the necklace with a sense of genuine volume that is rare of this type of jewelry. This kind of blue coral is mined only on the shoals of the Gulf of Biafra, located on African West Coast near Cameroon. Overall, blue triangular corals are complemented with elliptical howlite beads giving this necklace a feeling of unique and authentic charm, as well as a true sense of presence.

Materials

Since the ancient times coral is a traditional gift of protection for the expectant mother or a newborn child. Coral is also associated with emotional healing. Blue coral in particular is believed to have an ability of reconnecting oneself to one’s inner child, providing stability, reducing fear and finding inner peace. Coral is also believed to extend its protection to anyone living, traveling or working by/in the sea. Since coral is of organic origin, it is often thought of as an aid in rekindling one’s relationship with nature and its wonders, stimulating creativity and optimism, as well as enabling it’s bearer to enjoy life to the fullest. It may be the reason why, all around the world, coral has been used as jewelry for at least thousands of years.

Howlite is considered to be a stone of calm and tranquility. A stone that can calm and soothe the emotions, help cope with an overactive mind and achieve a deep and restful sleep. Howlite is believed to reduce conflicts, facilitate communication, promote kindness, compassion and peaceful coexistence.  This truly beautiful and tranquil gem is believed to aid in clarifying one’s mind to develop a more prominent awareness of one’s ambitions and goals. Often referred to as an ‘attunement stone’, Howlite is thought to help expand the horizons and open the mind to wisdom and new knowledge.

About Tsumi

Tsumi is a brand born from the love of fashion, as well as an inherent need to be original and unique. Each Tsumi accessory is infused by a touch of authentic ethnic flair and is inspired by joyful memories of traveling the world. Tsumi accessories are crafted with an incredible skill, while remaining visionary and creative pieces of contemporary jewelry.

Most of Tsumi accessories are made in either limited quantity or in one unique specimen. Tsumi is also synonymous with an exceptional selection of original and rare materials used to create their stylish accessories. These include semi-precious stones, corals, pearls and crystals, making Tsumi jewelry not only an embodiment of original style, but also an experience.

The post Tsumi Blue Coral and Howlite Neclace TS182 appeared first on Nuage Showroom.
